pets.name: Jennifer
pets.description: Jennifer is a sweet 2 months old Labrador that is patiently waiting to find a new forever home. This girl really enjoys being able to go outside to run and play, but won't hesitate to play up a storm in the house if she has all of her favorite toys.

pets.name: Deuce
pets.description: Deuce will greet you with a steady purr and arch her back, rubbing against you affectionately. She is very loving and loveable! We recommend an adult-only (or older children) home for Deuce because lots of noise and chaos is unnerving to her.

pets.name: Woody
pets.description: Woody is a handsome 3 1/2 year old boy. Woody does know basic commands and is a smart pup. Since he is on the stronger side, he will learn a lot from your training. Woody will be happier when he finds a new family that can spend a lot of time with him.

pets.name: Scarlett
pets.description: Scarlett is a happy, playful girl who will make you laugh and smile. She forms a bond quickly and will make a loyal companion and a wonderful family dog or a good companion for a single individual too since she likes to hang out and be with her human.

pets.name: Katrine
pets.description: Katrine is a beautiful girl. She is as soft as the finest velvet with a thick lush fur. Will love you until the last breath she takes as long as you are the one. She is picky about her affection. She loves cuddles and to stretch into your hands for a deeper relaxations.

pets.name: Paul
pets.description: Paul enjoys hosting fancy dinners and getting turkey treats. He even will let you pet him as he's brushing his tail under against your legs under the table. He likes a quiet home and he will purr when getting belly rubs. His favorite treat is turkey directly out of hand.

pets.name: Libra
pets.description: Libra is a beautiful female cat looking for a loving home. She is good with other cats and loves attention. She is under a year old.

pets.name: Charly
pets.description: This cute boy, Charly, is three years old and he likes adults and kids. He isn’t fond of many other dogs, so he might do best in a single dog home. Charly has lots of energy, and loves to run and play. We think a fenced yard would make him very happy.

pets.name: Beth
pets.description: Beth is super energetic and loves to be outside. She is getting used to inside living. She needs training and manners. Beth will require patience and training. She is smart and not aggressive at all. Unfortunately, Beth has been hungry much of her life so she is very food motivated.

pets.name: Jigger
pets.description: Jigger is a friendly and curious boy. He is 7 months old and ready for an adventure with his new family. He is good with other cats.

pets.name: Smoke
pets.description: Smoke is incredibly beautiful Shepherd/Husky mix. He's a little shy but will love you once he gets to know you. He is in the kennel with his buddy Micah and they get along famously. He has lots of energy. Please come meet this beautiful soul. I guarantee you'll fall in love!

pets.name: Stormie
pets.description: Hello! I'm Stormie, and I'm looking for an active home where I can really stretch my legs and play! We can have all kinds of fun running together, hiking trails, or maybe swimming! Wow! Swimming? Let's try it this summer! If your looking for a playful pup then look no further!

pets.name: Hank
pets.description: Hank is a very sweet boy from an Aurora Village litter. He is friendly and good with people.

pets.name: Ottis
pets.description: Ottis is a big beautiful boy who is a little shy of people at first but warms up quickly. He is a real ladies man as well. All the girl dogs love him.

pets.name: Freddie
pets.description: Freddie is a little shy at first, but very sweet when he warms up. He likes playing with shoe strings and bottle caps. He is quick to learn the rhythms of his human’s daily life. Freddie has bounced around a lot in his life, and is looking to find his forever home.

pets.name: Chess
pets.description: Big wonderful boy, Chess is a sweetheart. He has a rich short haired coat with his own personal color-coordinated mask. He is probably around 3 years old. He does fine with other cats but he would probably be okay as the only cat. NO DOGS! He will lots of love and a good yard where he can go outside and do a little hunting when he gets a hankering to explore his inner cat-ness.

pets.name: Olaf
pets.description: During these unusual times wouldn't you like a companion who will chat with you? Olaf is a 4 year old long haired male with sky blue eyes who can hold a conversation. He comes "a talking" when you call him. He is learning to tolerate the dogs in his foster home and gets along well with the other cats. He seems content to laze on the couch with you.

pets.name: Ferdinand
pets.description: Ferdinand is a petite (about four pounds), timid, spayed male young adult cat, likely born the summer or fall of 2019. Both of his ears appear to have been frostbitten. He also has "thumbs" on his front feet because he is polydactyl.

pets.name: Cookie
pets.description: Cookie is a spayed, short-haired, small and friendly female likely born in early 2019 or late 2018.Hera must know she was named for a goddess because she quickly elevates herself to that status in a new household. She may be regal, but that doesn't mean she doesn't enjoy playing. She is fun and friendly, sweet and sassy, and always dressed to impress. She's a curious girl who loves attention from her human and welcomes nose kisses. She may need time to warm up to other animals in the house.

pets.name: Timmy
pets.description: Timmy is an adorable grey british shorthair male. He loves to play and snuggle. He is neutered and up to date on age appropriate vaccinations. He can be chatty and enjoys being held. Timmy has a lot to say and wants a person to share his thoughts with.

pets.name: Sophia
pets.description: Sophia here and I'm looking for my forever home to live out the best years of my life. I am full of energy. Everyday I'm learning new things, like how to walk on a leash, go potty outside, bark and play with toys and I still need some practice.
